sense.gloss: to wrap up, to pack, to bundle, to do up
to cover, to envelop, to shroud, to engulf
to give (money in an envelope; as a wedding gift, funeral offering, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑包↑↓|つつ↓む|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓はありません。
sdata.e: You don't have to wrap it up.

sdata.j: ↑恋↑↓こい↓は↑多↑↓おお↓く↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑苦痛↑↓くつう↓を↑包↑↓|つつ↓む|オブラートなり。
sdata.e: Love is a pill made from a great many people's sufferings.

sdata.j: いつかオートクチュールに↑身↑↓み↓を↑包↑↓|つつ↓む|んだという↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓が↑意外↑↓いがい↓な↑形↑↓かたち↓で↑実現↑↓じつげん↓した。
sdata.e: One day, her dream to be dressed in haute couture came true in an unexpected way.

sdata.j: ↑包↑↓|つつ↓む|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓はありません。
sdata.e: You don't need to wrap it.
